mods.abstract: The Red Foley Show, originally broadcast in July of 1958. Featuring Red Foley (host/performer), Joe Slattery (announcer), Faron Young (performer), the Jordanaires (performers), Wanda Jackson (performer), and the Slim Wilson Band (performers). An NBC syndication originating at WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
